--- DateTime: 2021/2/2 10:45 下午
---

local ActionPool = typesys.def.ActionPool {
    _actions = typesys.__unmanaged,
}

function ActionPool:__ctor(...)
    self._actions = {}
end

function ActionPool:push_action(func)
    table.insert(self._actions, func)
end

function ActionPool:tick(delta_time)
    for _, action in ipairs(self._actions) do
        if action ~= nil then
            action()
        end

        self._actions[_] = nil
    end

    self._actions = {}
end
